code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{ClubsData}from"../data/ClubsData";import AOS from'aos';import{Helmet}from'react-helmet';import'aos/dist/aos.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Clubs=function Clubs(){useEffect(function(){AOS.init();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Helmet,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("title",{children:"Clubs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"description",content:""})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{id:"page-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Clubs and Focused Groups"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-container",children:ClubsData.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-lg-container","data-aos":"fade-up",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-lg-container-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:"item"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-lg-container-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/club/".concat(item.ClubName),onClick:function onClick(){return window.scrollTo(0,0);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.ClubName})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-lg-container-btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/club/".concat(item.ClubName),onClick:function onClick(){return window.scrollTo(0,0);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"card-lg-btn",children:"Read More "})})})]})})]})});})})]});};export default Clubs;
